text: Zombie workloads are a big problem says @holly_cummins. K8s is no exception. It's wasting electricity, burning fossil fuels and causing climate change. When you're done with your K8s cluster, turn it off. #KubeCon #CloudNativeCon https://t.co/rRiZ0viuI4

author.name: Libby Clark
author.description: Open source community marketing & strategy @AWS. Opinions are my own.
